mcvis 0.2.4
  • Reference

Multi-collinearity Visualization

mcvis.Rd

Multi-collinearity Visualization

mcvis(X, method = "bootstrap", steps = 1000L)

Arguments

X

A matrix of regressors (without intercept terms).
method

The resampling method for the data. Current supports "bootstrap" or "cv"(cross-validation).
steps

Number of sampling runs we perform. Default to 1000.

Examples

library(mplot)
data("artificialeg")
X=artificialeg[,1:9]
mcvis(X)
#> $X
